nodes.title: Added another sync point for entering mission running state.
Changed rewardForReachingPosition to take floats. Also some other API Calls.
Make sure server is paused before client's pause episode exits.
Allow XSDs to live in a different location
Sample_missions folder with new and modified missions, and the table
Fix: avoid parallel builds breaking where manually-copied files were colliding
Replacing hard-coded paths in .csproj files with CMake variables
Added CMake flags to disable components of the build.
Fix: adding mutex in ClientConnection to prevent problems when multip…
Added logging; removed execrable string sending method.
Added ability to write strings > than 64k in message data (issue #52)
Added tostring() bindings for Lua objects
Fix issue where messages would occasionally be lost.
Made github landing page more friendly.
Fix: rare case when a reward message arrives on the video port in the next mission.
Added Travis-CI build configuration file and build status badge.
Fix: avoid need to edit FindXsd.cmake on Ubuntu 14.04 and Debian 7.
Updated Mac instructions for OSX 10.12, improved clarity
Multiagent missions with a single set of credentials, on the same machine.
Sending errors to the err stream instead of out stream in the Java example
Multi-agent support with a single set of credentials.
Remove grace period of invulnerability at start of mission
Garbage collected each time the client reaches the dormant state.
Questions in a world of blue
Force-load the initial chunk to help with block sync issues.
Add new method to API for setting start angles.
Added a default options.txt with less fancy render settings to improve framerate
ObservationFromGrid can now also return a fixed-location grid.
Weather now periodically reset during mission run.
Fix: give MALMOERROR on multi-agent mission with matching mission and experiment ID
Fix: missions now checked for equality in multi-agent missions.
Attack and use commands now trigger rewards
Fix: calling Xerces Initialize and Terminate
Fix: use and attack in discrete movement multi-agent missions
Added sample showing robust frame-action pairs
Extended tabular_q_learning.py to request frames too
Adding a 'quit' command to allow the agent to end the mission at any time.
Made spawn control more sensible and less leaky.
Changed interchange of rewards from xml to simple string format.
Added smelting recipes to simple crafting.
Added sample to demonstrate mob spawning.
Merging Human action py2 into master
Added ability to query MissionSpec for the allowed commands and command handlers.
Added support for `use` and  `attack` commands in discrete mode.
adding schema definition for chat message reward handler
extending human_action.py to allow custom mission_xml + display summary
Updated comment about how to create PIL images.
Creating tutorial 2 and tutorial 3 in C#, translating from Python
Fix overclocking not applying to client in obfuscated environment
Add a Gitter chat badge to README.md
Add retries in samples, to help pass integration tests
Caches JAXBContexts because they are unbelievably slow to create.
Changed WorldState from shared_ptr of vectors to vectors of shared_ptrs
Added option to change camera viewpoint. This closes #121.
Multi-agent scenarios should now cope with loss of connection.
Update about the guide about installing ffmpeg
Update to available version of JDK8
Implement better Boost::Python finding routine in CMake
Various changes to inventory management, rewards and quits from collecting and crafting items.
Various changes to inventory management, rewards and quits from collecting and crafting items.
remove entry point - scripted in k8 yaml
add timouts to more client states
Log mission init digest and rewards (or totals) for scoring
Adding a simple Room Maze mission xml
add replaceable flag to launch py script
Oops, partial correct of install docs
Use boost python (Was proposed: Utility class) to help track client infos in a client pool.
#678 - Fixed FFPMEG file name in installation script
add mod custom_port setting to ClientInfo api
Modern CMake and no XSD gen.
Fixing format error when running tutorial_6
Casting color var to int to solve TypeError
Fixes for save_images in python examples for python3. Fixes #631
Update to newer version of Minecraft
Added life to observations of living entities.
Fixes to windows install script + instructions
